sources.title: Mercy Plane
sources.description: Air races, plane-stealing gangsters and a battle-of-the-sexes romance from PRC before it was PRC. If a plane that takes off doesn't always resemble the plane that lands, remember it's only a movie. Directed by Richard Harlan. Released in 1939. a.k.a. "Wonder Plane" (UK). Complete print. TRIVIA: First telecast on April 4, 1948 by the long-since-defunked Dumont Network channel 5 in Los Angeles.

metadata.Plot: In this Producers Pictures Corporation production, distributed by Producers Distributing Corporation (and both company names would soon become Producers Releasing Corporation, both as a production and a distributing company), air-race champions "Speed" Leslie and Branda Fowler combine to open a very profitable airplane service that flies patients to other cities for special treatment. Gangsters soon move in and offer to take over, without an invitation.
metadata.Actors: James Dunn, Frances Gifford, Matty Fain
